hadiths.english_translation: Abd al-Rahman informed us, he said: Ibrahim narrated to us, he said: Adam narrated to us, he said: Abu Fadhalah narrated to us, he said: We narrated 'Urwah ibn Ruwaym al-Lakhmi, that Jesus ﷺ called upon his Lord, the Blessed and Exalted, requesting Him to show him the position of Satan among the children of Adam. Satan became manifest to him, and behold, his head was like the head of a snake, placed upon the fruit of the heart. When the servant remembers his Lord, the Mighty and Majestic, Satan withdraws his head. And when he abandons the remembrance, Satan settles upon his heart and whispers to him. Allah the Mighty and Majestic says: 'From the evil of the whisperer, the retreater (Surah an-Nas, verses 4-5), who whispers in the breasts of humanity.'"
